data.name: 花妖物语/Flower girl - CG壁纸/Wallpaper
data.detailed_description:
This DLC contains some beautiful CG.

Favorite players can open the game's local folder and get these images in the CG folder.
data.about_the_game:
This DLC contains some beautiful CG.

Favorite players can open the game's local folder and get these images in the CG folder.
data.short_description: This content needs to have a basic game [flower demon story / flower girl] on steam to play.
data.supported_languages:
English, Japanese*, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX11 capabilities
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX11 capabilities
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes:
This DLC will have the sexual behavior of the role, and the related content is not limited to training and SM.

All characters are over 18 years old
